name: Dmytro Yavornytsky
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to 150th anniversary of Dmytro Yavornytsky (1855 - 1940), a historian, archaeologist, ethnographer, specialist in folklore and writer. Being a person of versatile interests, Dmytro Yavornytsky devoted almost all his life to study the history of Zaporizhia Cossacks, which was crowned with `The History of Zaporizhia Cossacks` in three books
averseDescription: On the coin obverse there is depicted the small National Emblem of Ukraine, above which there is 2005, the coin issue year, under it - 2 ГРИВНІ, (2/ hryvnia), there are also the inscriptions around the coin circumference: УКРАЇНА (Ukraine) (above), НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ БАНК УКРАЇНИ (National Bank of Ukraine) (beneath) and the Mint logo of the National Bank of Ukraine (right
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is a depiction of a portrait of Dmytro Yavornytsky, to the right: 1855/1940, his years of life is inscribed and on both sides there is a semicircular inscription: ДМИТРО ЯВОРНИЦЬКИЙ (Dmytro Yavornytsky)
